profile:
We have been serving the Calgary area for over 15 years. In that time we have learned a thing or two about what it takes to be a great gas fitting business. We believe in doing great work and providing exceptional customer service, you can trust us to do the job right and on time.

As a gas fitting contracting business we have the skills and know-how to provide gas fitting solutions for everything from a basement remodel for a single customer to handling multiple communities for a home builder.

We provide gas line installation for new construction, residential, multi-family homes, small commercial, renovations, and custom homes. 

DETACHED GARAGE, GAS LIGHTS, PATIO HEATERS, BARBECUES, OUTDOOR KITCHENS
FIRE PITS, OUTDOOR FIREPLACES, CLOTHES DRYERS  
GAS TO STOVES, FURNACES, HOT WATER TANKS and GARAGE HEATERS

We would love to be part of your next project.

Not convinced? Check out our reviews at http://www.scottcogas.com/reviews

profile: All of our technicians are fully qualified so you can rest easy knowing your home or office is being serviced by an experienced plumber. We understand emergencies can happen at any time, which is why we are committed to providing top quality plumbing services. Rely on us to complete any job quickly, efficiently and effectively.

profile:
Here at Highcliffe Mechanical we are committed in providing competitive pricing with unparalleled service. We provide Residential and Commercial Plumbing, Heating, Gasfitting and Air Conditioning service to Calgary, Airdrie, Chestermere, Cochrane, Okotoks and multiple surrounding areas. 
From a leaky faucet, clogged drain, no heat or hot water, renovations, retro-fits, new installs through to new builds our dedicated team of professionals are here for you. With our 24/7 emergency service you can count on Highcliffe. Don't hesitate to call or message, we are here to help!
products: Sinks, faucets/taps, tubs, showers, toilets, bidets, fixtures, urinals, furnaces, thermostats, humidifiers, boilers, hot water tanks, instantaneous tankless water heaters, garage unit heaters, radiant heaters, water softeners, water filtration, pumps, fire places, UV lamps, A/C units, air purifiers.
services: Residential and Commercial Plumbing, Heating, Gasfitting and Air Conditioning. New installs, service, repairs, drain cleaning, renovations, retro-fits, new builds, preventative maintenance and lease bays.
